indicator.title: Output Indicator
indicator.description: % of CBOs/NGOs receiving training % of target population (CBOs/NGOs) implementing CBA measures from the Programme, disaggregated by gender % of targeted population participating in adaptation and risk awareness activities, disaggregated by gender % of CCCAF accessed Number of website visits % of stakeholders represented at discussions and exchanges Number of lessons learned and good practices on CCA measures generated and disseminated Number of contributions in online discussion fora

baseline.comment: There are no ongoing community-based adaptation (CBA) measures . Awareness of adaptation and risk are limited to technical professionals and has little translation at the community level, with no active awareness initiatives. Capacities of grassroots organizations with respect to project development and implementation is weak, but being gradually addressed through GEF SGP. Caribbean Planning for Adaptation to Climate Change (CPACC) implemented 1997-2001 http://www.caricom.org/jsp/projects/macc%20project/cpacc.jsp . Adaptation Learning Mechanism (ALM) is a global repository for mapping good practices, sharing knowledge and building networks on CC adaptation http://www.adaptationlearning.net/

target.comment: - 75% of CBOs/NGOs working in the target communities trained in project development and implementation - 25% of trained CBOs/NGOs implementing approved projects - 15% of target population participating in adaptation and risk awareness activities - 25% of CCCAF disbursed - 100 website visits - 50% of stakeholders represented at discussions and exchanges - 4 lessons learned and good practices disseminated - 50 contributions in online discussion fora - 4 PSC meetings convened - 30% delivery

actual.comment: - 35% of CBOs/NGOs working in the target communities trained in project development and implementation - 75% of trained CBOs/NGOs implementing approved projects - 20% of target population participating in adaptation and risk awareness activities - 0% of CCCAF disbursed - 1300 website visits (Facebook and Youtube integration included) - 75% of stakeholders represented at discussions and exchanges - 1 lessons learned and good practices disseminated (OECS) - 35 contributions in online discussion fora - 1 PSC meetings convened - 10% delivery

target.comment: - 65% of trained CBOs/NGOs implementing approved projects - 40% of target population participating in adaptation and risk awareness activities - 60% of CCCAF disbursed - 2,000 website visits - 60% of stakeholders represented - 8 lessons learned and good practices disseminated - 100 contributions - 4 PSC meetings convened - 65% delivery

actual.comment: pending.. to be completed end of 2015

iati-activity.title: MDG Acceleration in Grenada
iati-activity.description: This project will finalize the MDG Acceleration Framework (MAF) in Grenada via the development of an MDG Acceleration country action Plan (MAP).

iati-activity.title: MDG Acceleration in Grenada
iati-activity.description: The initiative aims to localize MDGs in Grenada. Results of the project include a prioritization of targets, action, indicators for Grenada and the integration of MDGs in National Planning and budget frameworks.

iati-activity.title: Support to Referendum on Constitutional Reform in Grenad
iati-activity.description: To support the constitutional review process in civic education sensitising the public to the reforms being proposed, and a precursor to the public referendum which is needed to endorse any constitutional amendments.

iati-activity.title: Referendum on Constitutional
iati-activity.description: It is expected to contribute to significant improvements in the country’s governance, in particular by strengthening public understanding of the constitution, and issues around human rights, gender equality and public accountability.

iati-activity.title: Public Investment Management System
iati-activity.description: To strengthen the Government’s capacity to coordinate the process and elaboration and implementation of technical assistance projects and to better align donor assistance with the national development plans and policies.

iati-activity.title: Public Investment Management
iati-activity.description: This project seeks to strengthen the Government’s capacity to coordinate the process and elaboration and implementation of technical assistance projects and to better align donor assistance with the national development plans and policies.
